summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Webster Street from 12th Avenue Southwest to 18th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16452 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
